thread.title: BRIEF-MMA Capital Management Says ‍Board Authorized Co To Implement A 2018 Stock Buyback Plan During Next Open Trading Window​

title: BRIEF-MMA Capital Management Says ‍Board Authorized Co To Implement A 2018 Stock Buyback Plan During Next Open Trading Window​

organizations.name: brief-mma capital management says ‍board authorized co

text: Market News March 16, 2018 / 1:09 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-MMA Capital Management Says ‍Board Authorized Co To Implement A 2018 Stock Buyback Plan During Next Open Trading Window​ Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - MMA Capital Management LLC: * MMA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT ANNOUNCES FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * MMA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LLC - ‍BOARD AUTHORIZED CO TO IMPLEMENT A 2018 STOCK BUYBACK PLAN DURING NEXT OPEN TRADING WINDOW​ * MMA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT - ‍ PLAN TO ALLOW FOR BUYBACK OF 125,000 SHARES BETWEEN NOW AND DEC 31, 2018, AT INITIAL MAXIMUM PURCHASE PRICE OF $30.00/SHARE​ * MMA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LLC - ‍ BOOK VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED TO $24.48 AT DECEMBER 31, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
